text: It was growing cold. We left the crowd and drove back to Vence. The cool evening perfumes stood beckoning at the corners of the roads. Mart is unable to smell her signals in the air. When we got back home we felt exhausted. London sickness (a sense of guilt, mingled with the memory of sandwiches and incestuous Soho pubs) still numbed our brains and bodies.
handwritten_text: It was growing cold. We left the crowd and drove back to Vence. The cool evening perfumes stood beckoning at the corners of the roads. Mart is unable to smell her signals in the air. When we got back home we felt exhausted. London sickness (a sense of guilt, mingled with the memory of sandwiches and incestuous Soho pubs) still numbed our brains and bodies.
